Collections.rule:
Class: @B*
Annotations: rdfs:label @B*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_segment_code @A*,
has_GPC_segment_title @B*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_segment_definition @C*(xml:lang="en" mm:SkipIfEmptyLocation),
dc:source https://www.gs1.org/standards/gpc

Class: @E*
SubClassOf: @B* 
Annotations: rdfs:label @E*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_class_code @D*,
has_GPC_class_title @E*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_class_definition @F*(xml:lang="en" mm:SkipIfEmptyLocation),
dc:source https://www.gs1.org/standards/gpc

Collections.comment: 2. For processing family and linking to segment
Collections.rule:
Class: @E*
SubClassOf: @B* 
Annotations: rdfs:label @E*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_family_code @D*,
has_GPC_family_title @E*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_family_definition @F*(xml:lang="en" mm:SkipIfEmptyLocation),
dc:source https://www.gs1.org/standards/gpc

Collections.comment: For making instance of attribute values and linking with attributes
Collections.rule:
Individual: @B*
Annotations: rdfs:label @B*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_attribute_value_code @A*,
has_GPC_attribute_value_title @B*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_attribute_definition @C*(xml:lang="en" mm:SkipIfEmptyLocation),
dc:source https://www.gs1.org/standards/gpc

Collections.comment: For linking attribute value instances with attributes
For processing attributes and linking to bricks
Collections.rule:
Class: @B*
SubClassOf: 'GS1 GPC Attribute'
Annotations: rdfs:label @B*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_attribute_code @A*,
has_GPC_attribute_title @B*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_attribute_definition @C*(xml:lang="en" mm:SkipIfEmptyLocation),
dc:source https://www.gs1.org/standards/gpc

Class: @E*
SubClassOf: @B*
Annotations: rdfs:label @E*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_brick_code @D*,
has_GPC_brick_title @E*(xml:lang="en"),
has_GPC_brick_definition_includes @F*(xml:lang="en" mm:SkipIfEmptyLocation),
has_GPC_brick_definition_excludes @G*(xml:lang="en" mm:SkipIfEmptyLocation),
dc:source https://www.gs1.org/standards/gpc
